channel.title: Agents of the O.D.D. (May Thurs)
channel.description:
![agentsofodd copy|690x336, 75%](upload://m8ssisXRORlkTM0TF7lY3fQvz8a.jpeg) This is for two May sessions of *Agents of the O.D.D*. by @JasonT. Attendance at all sessions is strongly encouraged, but not required. Rules will be taught. In session one we will establish tone, create our characters, and get going.
https://jasontocci.itch.io/agents-of-the-odd
> Agents of the O.D.D. is a tabletop roleplaying game of conscripted cryptids, shaky psychics, burned spies, and other investigators of the paranormal. Based on the rules from Into the Odd and Electric Bastionland, and inspired by series like Hellboy, Planetary, and The Laundry Files.
We will be using Zoom for our sessions. I’ll email all players about a week before the first session with the necessary links. Sessions will run up to three hours. We will plan to record, but I will confirm this with the players. [The Gauntlet Code of Conduct](https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/community-code-of-conduct.html) will be in play and we will use Lines and Veils and the [X-Card](http://tinyurl.com/x-card-rpg) for safety tools.
If you sign up and your availability changes, please remember to drop from the site and give me a heads up.
[date=2020-05-07 time=20:00:00 format="LLLL" timezone="America/New_York"] → [date=2020-05-07 time=23:00:00 format="LLLL" timezone="America/New_York"] [Session 1](https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-M1po4RZ4vNt8MBu4Oxd)
[date=2020-05-14 time=20:00:00 format="LLLL" timezone="America/New_York"] → [date=2020-05-14 time=23:00:00 format="LLLL" timezone="America/New_York"] [Session 2]( https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-M1poHi4YqzSa5x_6tcg)

item.title: Agents of the O.D.D. (May Thurs)
item.dc:creator: @beepeegee
item.description:
@beepeegee wrote:

Won’t be able to play this. But I love Into the Odd and its variants. Would love to hear/see how it works out with Agents of ODD

agentsofodd copy1024×500 423 KB

This is for two May sessions of Agents of the O.D.D. by @JasonT. Attendance at all sessions is strongly encouraged, but not required. Rules will be taught. In session one we will establish tone, create our characters, and get going.

itch.io

Agents of the O.D.D. by Jason Tocci

Paranormal investigators of the paranormal

Agents of the O.D.D. is a tabletop roleplaying game of conscripted cryptids, shaky psychics, burned spies, and other investigators of the paranormal. Based on the rules from Into the Odd and Electric Bastionland, and inspired by series like Hellboy, Planetary, and The Laundry Files.

We will be using Zoom for our sessions. I’ll email all players about a week before the first session with the necessary links. Sessions will run up to three hours. We will plan to record, but I will confirm this with the players. The Gauntlet Code of Conduct will be in play and we will use Lines and Veils and the X-Card for safety tools.

If you sign up and your availability changes, please remember to drop from the site and give me a heads up.

Friday, May 8, 2020 12:00 AM → Friday, May 8, 2020 3:00 AM Session 1

Friday, May 15, 2020 12:00 AM → Friday, May 15, 2020 3:00 AM Session 2
